raw_instruction: turn on the stove and put the moka pot on it
instruction_en: Make coffee using the moka pot on the stove.

raw_instruction: put the black bowl in the bottom drawer of the cabinet and close it
instruction_en: Put the black bowl into the bottom drawer of the cabinet and close the drawer.

raw_instruction: put the yellow and white mug in the microwave and close it
instruction_en: Put the mug inside the microwave and close the door.

raw_instruction: put both moka pots on the stove
instruction_en: Prepare hot coffee by using the moka pots available in the kitchen.

raw_instruction: LIVING ROOM SCENE1 put both the alphabet soup and the cream cheese box in the basket
instruction_en: Put the alphabet soup and cream cheese box into the basket in the living room.

raw_instruction: LIVING ROOM SCENE2 put both the alphabet soup and the tomato sauce in the basket
instruction_en: Put the alphabet soup and tomato sauce into the basket.

raw_instruction: LIVING ROOM SCENE2 put both the cream cheese box and the butter in the basket
instruction_en: Put the cream cheese and butter into the basket in the living room.

raw_instruction: LIVING ROOM SCENE5 ut the white mug on the left plate and put the yellow and white mug on the right plate
instruction_en: Place the white mug on the left plate and the yellow-and-white mug on the right plate in the living room.

raw_instruction: LIVING ROOM SCENE6 put the white mug on the plate and put the chocolate pudding to the right of the plate
instruction_en: Place the white mug on the plate and position the chocolate pudding to the right of it.

raw_instruction: STUDY SCENE1 pick up the book and place it in the back compartment of the caddy
instruction_en: Put the book into the back section of the caddy.

raw_instruction: pick up the alphabet soup and place it in the basket
instruction_en: Put the alphabet soup can into the shopping basket.

raw_instruction: pick up the bbq sauce and place it in the basket
instruction_en: Put the BBQ sauce in the basket.

raw_instruction: pick up the butter and place it in the basket
instruction_en: Put the butter in the basket.

raw_instruction: pick up the chocolate pudding and place it in the basket
instruction_en: Put the chocolate pudding into the basket.

raw_instruction: pick up the cream cheese and place it in the basket
instruction_en: Put the cream cheese in the basket.

raw_instruction: pick up the ketchup and place it in the basket
instruction_en: Put the ketchup bottle into the basket.

raw_instruction: pick up the milk and place it in the basket
instruction_en: Put the milk carton in the shopping basket.

raw_instruction: pick up the orange juice and place it in the basket
instruction_en: Put the orange juice in the basket.

raw_instruction: pick up the salad dressing and place it in the basket
instruction_en: Put the salad dressing in the basket.

raw_instruction: pick up the tomato sauce and place it in the basket
instruction_en: Put the tomato sauce in the basket.
